definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: cut in, inscribe, decree (NH id., Aram. [[חֲקַק]], Zinj. [[חקק]]; Ph. id. Pt. Hiph.; Ar. h.aq=a be just, right, obligatory, also make or decide to be just, etc.; h.aq=un justness, truth, necessity, obligation; Eth. h.q.: adj. moderate, sufficient; cf. also [[חקה]])—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: [[וְחַקּוֹתָ֫]] Ez Eze 4:1; sf. [[חַקּׂתִיח]] Is 49:16; Inf. sf. [[בְּחֻקּוֹ]] Pr 8:27; [[בְּחוּקוֹ]] Pr 8:29 (assim. to [[בְּשׂוּמוֹ]]); [[חֻקָּהּ]] Is 30:8; Pt. [[חׂקְקִי]] Is 22:16 (archaic case ending Ges:§ 90. 3 a); pl. [[חׂקְקִים]] Is 10:1; cstr. [[חוֹקְקֵי]] Ju Jdg 5:9 (poss. Poïel = [[מחוקקי]] with [[מְ]] omitted, v. Ges:§ 52 (2), note 6); Pt. Pass. pl. [[חֲקֻקִַים]] Ez Eze 23:14 (Co [[חקוקים]]);—
cut in, with [[בְּ]], Is 22:16, of a dwelling-place = tomb, in a rock.

cut in or on, upon, engrave, inscribe, c. [[על]] on roll of a book Is 30:8; representation of city on brick (as in Babylonia) Ez Eze 4:1; images on a wall Ez Eze 23:14; fig. of Zion's walls on palms of ´[[י]] Is 49:16.
trace, mark out, a circle, c. [[על]] over the face of deep Pr 8:27; c. acc., foundations of earth v:Pr 8:29.
of a law, engrave, inscribe (on a tablet), fig. for enact, decree [[חקקים חקקי און]] Is 10:1 (‖[[כתב עמל]]); [[חוֹקקֵי ישׂראל]] poet. = commanders (v.

definitions.title: Poïel
definitions.body: Impf. [[יְחוֹקְקוּ]] Pr 8:15; Pt. [[מְחׂקֵק]] Ge 49:10, Nu 21:18, De 33:21; sf. [[מְחׂקְקִי]] Ps 60:9, Ps 108:9; [[מְחׂקְקֵנוּ]] Is 33:22; pl. [[מְחׂקְקִים]] Ju Jdg 5:14; —inscribe (as a law), enact (poet.): c. acc. [[חֶדֶק]] Pr 8:15 elsewh. pt.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: prescriber of laws, hence (as sovereign authority in a warlike clan) commander De 33:21 (of warlike tribe of Gad), Ju Jdg 5:14, Is 33:22 (of ´[[י]]; ‖[[שׁׂפְטֵנוּ]], [[מַלְכֵּנוּ]]).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: commander's staff Ge 49:10 (‖[[שֵׁבֶט]]), Nu 21:18 (both poet.), Ps 60:9 = Ps 108:9.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. [[מְחֻקָּק]] that which is decreed Pr 31:5 (late).

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יֻחָָקַוּ]] Job 19:23 inscribed in ([[בְּ]]) a book.
